privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other applicable data protection laws.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.text: We collect essential information for the provision of services, such as name, email, and usage data, adhering to principles of data minimization and transparency.

usage.title: Data Usage and Processing
usage.text: Your data is used for authentication, service improvement, and communication. We implement industry-standard technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: Depending on your location, you may have the right to access, rectify, delete, or restrict the processing of your data (e.g., GDPR Art. 15-22, CCPA rights). Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: 4. Contact Us
contact.text: For any privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at: devproacademy@outlook.com.
